The 3-star-superior Hotel-Restaurant Rotes Einhorn is located in the Birgel district of Düren, at the edge of the Eifel region.

Originally a brewery, the hotel is family-run since 1989 and has been modernised in recent years. The bright rooms also feature a seating area, telephone, TV and a private bathroom with shower.

The Hotel-Restaurant Rotes Einhorn has an à la carte restaurant and common areas for up to 180 people, 2 traditional skittle lanes, a cosy conservatory as well as a beer garden in summer.

The new building, built in 2017, 500 metres from the main building, offers a spacious fitness and wellness area that can be used guests of both houses. It includes a large selection of modern fitness equipment, a Finnish sauna,  bio sauna and spacious relaxation area.
